definition: exoskeleton (the carapace of insects, crabs etc)

sentences.english: Bone cells or osteocytes are contained in spaces called lacunae.
sentences.chinese: 骨骼細胞或者是骨細胞存在於叫做空隙的空間裏。

sentences.english: Many species of invertebrate have shells or skeletons made of calcium carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 無脊椎類的好多物種有碳酸鈣質的外殼或骨骼。

sentences.english: Sometimes, bone is affected causing gross deformities.
sentences.chinese: 有時候骨骼受到侵襲，造成嚴重畸形。

sentences.english: This renewal keeps our bones incredibly strong and uniquely adaptable.
sentences.chinese: 這種更新使我們的骨骼異常堅硬，適應性奇強。

sentences.english: Kid, your bone precision, is a perfect person in practicing martial arts.
sentences.chinese: 小孩，你骨骼精奇，是練武奇才。

sentences.english: Objective In order to discuss the structure of the jaws and relation with occlusal patterns of different facial patterns.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討不同面型頜骨骨骼結構特徵及其與型的關係。

sentences.english: He proposed an indicator of osseous development in children.
sentences.chinese: 他提出了一個兒童骨骼發育的指標。

sentences.english: He was studying the structure skeleton.
Untreated, the condition damages the bones and connective tissue in the jaw.
sentences.chinese: 如果不治療，這種病會損害下巴的骨骼和結締組織。

sentences.english: Illustrated diagrams of animal anatomy including bones and muscles.
sentences.chinese: 畫報動物解剖圖，包括骨骼和肌肉。

sentences.english: Research suggests that tobacco use contributes to weak bones.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明抽菸會促成骨骼的脆弱。

sentences.english: Lower limb exoskeleton orthosis was used as rehabilitation device in gait training.
sentences.chinese: 設計用於步態康復訓練的下肢外骨骼矯形器。

sentences.english: It's typical Judaea, from the animal bones to the city wall.
sentences.chinese: 這是典型的猶太城市，不管從動物骨骼還是城牆上看。

sentences.english: Kidney essence is helpful for promoting the growth of skeleton.
sentences.chinese: 腎的精氣有促進骨骼生長的作用。

sentences.english: Yet the details of her skeleton proclaim her human affinity.
sentences.chinese: 骨骼細節遲早會證明她與人類的密切關係。

sentences.english: The knee extensors being much stronger than the flexors is one of the characters of the human skeletal muscles.
sentences.chinese: 伸膝肌遠較屈膝肌強大是人類骨骼肌的特徵之一。

definition: the four limbs of the body
the body/organism (usually human)/(fig.) fabric (of society etc)/cohesive structure (of an entity)
